positions.title: AI Engineer
highlights: Built a Workflow Builder Agent with LangChain + LangGraph that converts natural language into automated approval workflows, cutting process turnaround time by 60%
Streamlined Azure DevOps backlog updates, reducing manual tracking and accelerating sprint planning by 30%
Engineered a RAG-based knowledge framework indexing internal documentation and project data with vector embeddings, shrinking roadmap planning from 3 days to 6 hours
Devised a reusable base-agent framework and extended it to 10+ AI agents for banking and insurance, applying prompt engineering and tool integration

positions.title: Research Data Scientist
highlights: Assessed robustness of healthcare AI models using GPT and Llama LLMs, benchmarking the BlueBERT model (92.79% on medical abstracts and 78.2% on sentiment analysis)
Designed data perturbations (typos, homophones, removals) on clinical data simulating real-world noise
Applied statistical analysis to quantify performance degradation and guide reliability improvements

positions.title: Data Science Intern
highlights: Developed time-series forecasting models (LSTM for daily demand, Prophet for weekly/monthly trends) achieving ~82% accuracy
Interpreted delivery patterns through SQL queries and Tableau dashboards, optimizing routes to improve delivery speed by 20%

positions.title: Data Science Analyst
highlights: Performed customer segmentation with Hierarchical Clustering powering personalized campaigns
Led A/B testing of ad campaigns, increasing conversions by 20% and expanding customer base by 10%
Applied cohort analysis to identify high-value user segments, driving a 25% boost in retention
